metadata.name: NPC Dialogue Generator
metadata.description: Generates contextual dialogue for NPCs based on personality and world events
metadata.author: system

template:
Generate dialogue for [npc_name] ([faction], [alignment]).

Context:
- Current world events: [current_world_events]
- Player reputation: [player_reputation]

NPC Characteristics:
- Personality traits: [personality_traits]
- Current mood/motivation: [npc_mood]

Include:
- Dialogue options that reflect personality and faction perspective
- Opportunities for skill checks (persuasion, intimidation, deception)
- References to faction goals or world state

Maintain:
- Character consistency across interactions
- Lore accuracy
- Appropriate tone and vocabulary for character background

variables.name: alignment
variables.description: D&D alignment (e.g., Lawful Good, Chaotic Neutral)

variables.name: current_world_events
variables.description: Relevant world events the NPC would know about

variables.name: player_reputation
variables.description: How the NPC views the player
